divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving home, turned on my street when I saw a bright torquoise orb hovering, not pulsating. Then it started to pulsate rapidly, then would get really bright, dim out. No pattern to it. Still stationary, a red light started flying to it. Went right under and when slightly to the left, heard pop and then the torquoise orb started flying asH. The torquoise orb had hexagon al type patterns or scales.when looking through binoculars. Slight foggy aura around. The light just flew into the distance Auburn, ca
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Auburn
There were no other sightings in Auburn on or around May 18th 2012
Summary: bright torquoise orb and red light auburn, ca
